name: Aviarium
description:
Live life as a bird on a deserted island, with stunning mid-90s 3D graphics!

Unfortunately, the mac and linux builds are untested. Please leave a comment if you have any issues!

Created for the Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam. See the Jam page here:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/aviarium

Sound Credits:
https://freesound.org/people/pborel/sounds/474339/
https://freesound.org/people/kangaroovindaloo/sounds/205966/
https://freesound.org/people/vixuxx/sounds/9874/

Finding Movement by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3754-finding-movement
